translations.en:
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¿ Happy Constitution Day!

Today marks the 33rd anniversary of the adoption of our Constitution, the guarantee of our freedom of citizens, peaceful and peaceful life. 

May you all be blessed on the day of the adoption of our Constitution, which is considered a bright symbol of the independence of our country, a strong support and a legal guarantee of the development of society!
